Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the fact that the cast of the film "Black Panther" was placed on an FBI watch list.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or credible sources provided to back up the claim.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the cast of "Black Panther" was placed on an FBI watch list without any solid evidence or justification.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to consider alternative explanations or possibilities for why the cast might be on a watch list, if any.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the story is fabricated and not based on reality.
Understate: The claim may understate the impact or consequences of racial profiling and the potential harm it can cause.
